name: UFO - Unfortunately Fortunate Organisms
description: U.F.O is an alien resource management action game where you beam up humans using your spaceship and churn them into resources to upgrade your spaceship. In 30 days, the evil galactic warlord will complete his master weapon. Can you defeat him in time or will he bring extinction to your race?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater. Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB video memory. Storage: 300 MB available space
